mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into board (bno, mid, btitle, bcontent, bcategory, battachoname, battachtype, battachdata, bhitcount, bcreatedat, benabled) values (#{bno},#{mid},#{btitle},#{bcontent},#{bcategory},#{battachoname},#{battachtype},#{battachdata},#{bhitcount},systimestamp,#{benabled})
mapper.update: update board set benabled=0 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, mnickname as mid , btitle, bcontent, bcategory, battachoname, battachtype, battachdata, bhitcount, bcreatedat, benabled from board b INNER JOIN member m on b.mid = m.mid where bno = #{bno}
select count(*) from board where benabled = 1

select count(*) from board where benabled = 1
AND btitle like '%${word}%'
AND bcontent like '%${word}%'
AND mid like '%${word}%'
AND (btitle like '%${word}%' OR bcontent like '%${word}%')
select count(*) from board where benabled = 1 AND bcategory = #{category}
mapper.update: update board set bhitcount = bhitcount + 1 where bno = #{bno}
